title: Bihar voters challenging deletions will get mandatory hearing, says ECI
subtitle: A senior Election Commission official says that the Electoral Registration Officer will take a call on their inclusion on the final list or exclusion; to those excluded, the officer will issue a ‘speaking order’, stating the reasons for the decision
author: Sreeparna Chakrabarty
